languages.text: "Ты знаешь мой ответ — мир скомпрометирован, обитатели затронуты скверной. Но я сомневаюсь, что ты последуешь моему совету, проистекающему из этой оценки". {n}Хейнрикс криво ухмыляется.{/n} "По крайней мере я избавлю тебя от соблазна заглянуть в архивы, которые сломили волю Эмелины..."

"You know my answer — the world has been compromised, its inhabitants touched by corruption. However, I doubt you will take the advice that follows from my assessment." {n}Heinrix smirks crookedly.{/n} "At the very least, I will rid you of the temptation to take a peek at the archives that broke Emelina's will..."
languages.original_text: "Ты знаешь мой ответ — мир скомпрометирован, обитатели затронуты скверной. Но я сомневаюсь, что ты последуешь моему совету, проистекающему из этой оценки". {n}Хейнрикс криво ухмыляется.{/n} "По крайней мере я избавлю тебя от соблазна заглянуть в архивы, которые сломили волю Эмелины..."

However, I doubt you will take the advice that follows from my assessment." {n}Heinrix smirks crookedly.{/n} "At the very least, I will rid you of the temptation to take a peek at the archives that broke Emelina's will..."

"You know my answer — the world has been compromised, its inhabitants touched by corruption. However, I doubt you will take the advice that follows from my assessment." {n}Heinrix smirks crookedly.{/n} "At the very least, I will rid you of the temptation to take a peek at the archives that broke Emelina's will..."

languages.text: “你很清楚我的答案。这个世界已经遭到了破坏，行星上的居民已经受到了腐化的影响。不过，我认为你恐怕未必会采取我的建议。”{n}海因里希对你露出了狡猾的笑容。{/n}“不过至少，我绝不会允许你任由好奇心的诱惑，去偷看那些腐化了艾米莉娜的资料……”
languages.original_text: "You know my answer — the world has been compromised, its inhabitants touched by corruption. However, I doubt you will take the advice that follows from my assessment." {n}Heinrix smirks crookedly.{/n} "At the very least, I will rid you of the temptation to take a peek at the archives that broke Emelina's will..."

traits.locale_text: “你很清楚我的答案。这个世界已经遭到了破坏，行星上的居民已经受到了腐化的影响。不过，我认为你恐怕未必会采取我的建议。”{n}海因里希对你露出了狡猾的笑容。{/n}“不过至少，我绝不会允许你任由好奇心的诱惑，去偷看那些腐化了艾米莉娜的资料……”

languages.text: «Ya conoce mi respuesta: el mundo está perdido y la corrupción ha arraigado en sus habitantes. Sin embargo, dudo que vaya a seguir la recomendación evidente dada esa evaluación». {n}Heinrix esboza una sonrisa torcida.{/n} «Como mínimo, le ahorraré la tentación de echar un vistazo a los archivos que doblegaron la voluntad de Emelina...».
languages.original_text: "You know my answer — the world has been compromised, its inhabitants touched by corruption. However, I doubt you will take the advice that follows from my assessment." {n}Heinrix smirks crookedly.{/n} "At the very least, I will rid you of the temptation to take a peek at the archives that broke Emelina's will..."

traits.locale_text: «Ya conoce mi respuesta: el mundo está perdido y la corrupción ha arraigado en sus habitantes. Sin embargo, dudo que vaya a seguir la recomendación evidente dada esa evaluación». {n}Heinrix esboza una sonrisa torcida.{/n} «Como mínimo, le ahorraré la tentación de echar un vistazo a los archivos que doblegaron la voluntad de Emelina...».

languages.text: 「私の答えはご存知でしょう。世界は堕落し、住民は汚職にさらされている。しかし、私の評価に基づくアドバイスをあなたが受け入れるとは思えません」{n}ハインリックスは歪んだ笑みを浮かべた。{/n}「せめて、エメリナの意志を打ち壊したアーカイブを覗いてみたいという誘惑だけは取り除きます…」
languages.original_text: "You know my answer — the world has been compromised, its inhabitants touched by corruption. However, I doubt you will take the advice that follows from my assessment." {n}Heinrix smirks crookedly.{/n} "At the very least, I will rid you of the temptation to take a peek at the archives that broke Emelina's will..."

traits.locale_text: 「私の答えはご存知でしょう。世界は堕落し、住民は汚職にさらされている。しかし、私の評価に基づくアドバイスをあなたが受け入れるとは思えません」{n}ハインリックスは歪んだ笑みを浮かべた。{/n}「せめて、エメリナの意志を打ち壊したアーカイブを覗いてみたいという誘惑だけは取り除きます…」

languages.text: « Vous connaissez ma réponse. Ce monde a été compromis par la corruption qui a touché ses habitants. Cependant, je doute que vous écoutiez le conseil qui suivra mon analyse, {n}déclare Heinrix avec un sourire en coin.{/n} À tout le moins, je vous ferai passer l'envie de jeter un coup d'œil aux archives qui ont brisé l'esprit d'Emelina... »
languages.original_text: "You know my answer — the world has been compromised, its inhabitants touched by corruption. However, I doubt you will take the advice that follows from my assessment." {n}Heinrix smirks crookedly.{/n} "At the very least, I will rid you of the temptation to take a peek at the archives that broke Emelina's will..."

traits.locale_text: « Vous connaissez ma réponse. Ce monde a été compromis par la corruption qui a touché ses habitants. Cependant, je doute que vous écoutiez le conseil qui suivra mon analyse, {n}déclare Heinrix avec un sourire en coin.{/n} À tout le moins, je vous ferai passer l'envie de jeter un coup d'œil aux archives qui ont brisé l'esprit d'Emelina... »

languages.text: "Ihr kennt meine Antwort – diese Welt wurde kompromittiert, ihre Bewohner sind der Verderbnis erlegen. Allerdings bezweifle ich, dass Ihr den Rat, der aus dieser Einschätzung folgt, befolgen werdet." {n}Heinrix lächelt verschlagen.{/n} "Zumindest werde ich Euch die Versuchung nehmen, einen Blick in die Archive zu nehmen, die Emelinas Willen gebrochen haben ..."
languages.original_text: "You know my answer — the world has been compromised, its inhabitants touched by corruption. However, I doubt you will take the advice that follows from my assessment." {n}Heinrix smirks crookedly.{/n} "At the very least, I will rid you of the temptation to take a peek at the archives that broke Emelina's will..."

Allerdings bezweifle ich, dass Ihr den Rat, der aus dieser Einschätzung folgt, befolgen werdet." {n}Heinrix lächelt verschlagen.{/n} "Zumindest werde ich Euch die Versuchung nehmen, einen Blick in die Archive zu nehmen, die Emelinas Willen gebrochen haben ..."

languages.text: "Yanıtımı biliyorsun. Bu dünyanın kutsallığı ihlal edildi. İçinde yaşayanlar yozlaşmaya maruz kaldı. Ancak değerlendirmelerime güvenip, sana verebileceğim tavsiyeye uyacağından şüpheliyim." {n}Heinrix çarpık bir şekilde gülümsüyor.{/n} "En azından Emelina'nın iradesini kırmayı başaran arşivlere bakma arzunu engelleyebilirim."
languages.original_text: "You know my answer — the world has been compromised, its inhabitants touched by corruption. However, I doubt you will take the advice that follows from my assessment." {n}Heinrix smirks crookedly.{/n} "At the very least, I will rid you of the temptation to take a peek at the archives that broke Emelina's will..."

Ancak değerlendirmelerime güvenip, sana verebileceğim tavsiyeye uyacağından şüpheliyim." {n}Heinrix çarpık bir şekilde gülümsüyor.{/n} "En azından Emelina'nın iradesini kırmayı başaran arşivlere bakma arzunu engelleyebilirim."
